Add your release notes below. Use one of these sections as appropriate:

### Added
- New feature or capability

### Changed
- Changes in existing functionality

### Fixed
- Bug fixes

### Removed
- Removed features

### Security
- Security-related changes

### Deprecated
- Soon-to-be removed features

Example:
### Added
- Support for PHP 8.4
- New `bin/deploy` script for production deployments

### Fixed
- Fixed Xdebug configuration for VS Code
-->
